title: What will be the specifications of a Realme 5 Pro? - Quora

response.answer_text: The dual-SIM (Nano) Realme 5 Pro runs Color OS 6.0 based on Android 9 Pie. It sports a 6.3-inch full-HD+ (1080x2340 pixels) display with Corning Gorilla Glass 3+ for protection. The Realme 5 Pro is powered by Qualcomm's still rather new Snapdragon 712 SoC, paired with 4GB, 6GB, or 8GB of RAM depending on the variant. Realme 5 Pro bears a quad rear camera setup with a 48-megapixel Sony IMX586 primary sensor, coupled with PDAF and an f/1.8 aperture. This is accompanied by an 8-megapixel sensor featuring an f/2.25 aperture and a 119-degree wide-angle lens. The quad camera setup is rounded up by a 2-megapixel macro lens (f/2.4 aperture + 4cm focus distance), and a 2-megapixel portrait lens (f/2.4 aperture). There is electronic image stabilisation (EIS) tech included as well. There is electronic image stabilisation (EIS) tech included as well.

Realme introduced it’s latest smartphone Realme 5 and Realme 5 Pro with AI Quad camera set up Realme 5 introduced in the Indian market under the price 9999 to 11999 and Realme 5 pro introduced in the Indian market under the price 13999 to 16999  Realme 5 specifications Realme 5 come with 6.5-inch HD+ (720×1600 pixels) Display with waterdrop notch and Corning Gorilla Glass 3+ for protection The Realme 5 smartphone have been confirmed to sport a Qualcomm Snapdragon 665 Octa Core 2.0 GHz Processor  The Realme 5 has dual-sim(nano) with dedicated sd card slot It’s based on the latest version of Color OS 6.0 based on Android 9 Pie. Its has Two variant 3GB RAM with 32GB storage and 4GB RAM with 64GB Storage Its has Two-color variant one is Crystal Blue and another is Crystal Purple and look is awesome The Realme 5 AI Camera quad-camera system it is 12-megapixel f/1.8 primary camera setup The other cameras the same 8-megapixel ultra-wide-angle camera and two 2-megapixel sensors where one is for macros and the other is for portraits. The rear camera also supports Nightscape, Chroma Boost and HDR modes. Upfront, the ptomaine gets a 13-megapixel selfie camera with HDR and AI Mode. Realme 5 base model priced starting at Rs 9,999 with 3GB of RAM and 32GB of internal storage. It also comes in 4GB + 64GB and 4GB + 128GB variants that are priced at Rs 10,999 and Rs 11,999, The Realme Smartphones available Colors is Crystal Blue and Crystal Purple colors. Realme 5 pro specification The Realme 5 pro-dual-SIM (Nano) runs Color OS 6.0 based on Android 9 Pie. It has a 6.3-inch full-HD+ (1080×2340 pixels) display with Corning Gorilla Glass 3+ for protection. The Realme 5 Pro is powered by Qualcomm’s latest Snapdragon 712 SoC  The Realme 5 Pro has a quad rear camera AI setup with a 48-megapixel Sony IMX586 primary sensor and an f/1.8 aperture. three another camera is an 8-megapixel sensor featuring an f/2.25 aperture and a 119-degree wide-angle lens. The second another is rounded up by a 2-megapixel macro lens (f/2.4 aperture + 4cm focus distance), and a 2-megapixel portrait lens (f/2.4 aperture).
